profile.name: Wenxuan
profile.title: Full Stack Developer
profile.description: Experienced in scalable backend solutions and modern frontend architectures

projects.title: High-Concurrency Flash Sale System
projects.description: An enterprise-grade e-commerce backend designed to withstand 'Black Friday' traffic spikes. Features a funnel architecture with multi-level caching (Redis/JVM), atomic inventory control via Lua scripts to prevent overselling, and RabbitMQ for asynchronous traffic peak shaving.

projects.title: Distributed Patient Management
projects.description: A healthcare microservices platform simulating AWS cloud architecture. Implements hybrid communication patterns using synchronous gRPC for low-latency billing and asynchronous Kafka for event-driven analytics, deployed via Docker and LocalStack.
